channel.title: Adding different crowns for mod,admin,owner,co owner
channel.description:
can please someone please tell me how to add the different crowns for mod,admin,owner, co owner instead of them bieng all gold for all the admins and stuff. id like them to be different so i can tell the difference and stuff
thanks, smerf45
